review: Simply one of the greatest RTS titles ever made to rival that of C&C, Starcraft and Warcraft.

9 different  classes with their own unique play styles? Various maps with unique modes? A trade and item creation system? The Mann. Co Store? HATS*? Endless hours of fun with teamwork? FREE TO PLAY? What's not to like about this game?! Try it out now or forever hold your peace!*actually, no one cares about hats, just that they pretend to do so
